website_summaries.verdict: The top budget set of mountain biking handlebars. Makes a good quick and affordable replacement.
pros: Plenty of handle room for different grip styles
Installation relies on a single bolt connected to the steering tube clamp

customer_reviews.title: Nice Handlebars
customer_reviews.text: My "used" handlebars arrived very well packaged. They had a couple small, almost unnoticeable scratches, but were in great condition. Symmetry can be an issue with cheap handlebars, but these were almost perfect, maybe less than 1/4" difference on each side measured from center. Paint seems good. Finish is a slightly dull gloss. Thickness of the tube material seems good, about average. My Shimano Altus shifters and break levers slid on just fine and my Ergon grips also slid on perfectly. So no problems, quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: technical-engineer

customer_reviews.title: Good but watch for cables sizes and accessories
customer_reviews.text: I like the bars fit perfectly just one thing tho, the breaks cables were very tightly and I think I’ll need to get a longer one and there’s no much space to put your accessories, I’ll have to buy a extender bar. I bought another 1 for my wife , was complaining about shoulder pain. Loved
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed to make the ride comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Just recently bought a mountain bike and found it to be quite uncomfortable with the flat handlebar. After riding for a short while both my back and hands were uncomfortable. So, I decided to see if this could be remedied. These bars were the answer. I am amazed that this simple bar swap could make such a difference. I now sit more upright and the pressure on my back and hands is gone. If you are even thinking about this I highly recommend doing it! Installation was pretty simple and straightforward. This is one of those simple changes that is worth it !
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, wife's bike had straight handle bars which meant she needed to lean forward too much. She doesn't like cruiser handles and it's a mountain bike so I gave this a shot. A little tricky transferring the gears over since it's so much higher than the original bars but fairly easy to do. I angled it so it's not just a rise but it goes toward her a little bit. We had bought another bike (sold it now) and if this didn't work we were going to try buying another one. Now she's comfortable riding and I got new grips to match her bike, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: work great

customer_reviews.title: Changed the Feel of my Bike!
customer_reviews.text: As a taller rider, the original Bars were to low for me, the 5" rise is perfect! I'm not sure if the shifter cables would have to be changed, but with the eBike conversion I eliminated the 3-speed Shifter and had ordered a new 7-speed shifter, so the new shifter cable was long enough.

These handlebars helped take a lot of the forward lean out or my posture thus making my rides much more comfortable and much longer. These were a huge improvement to my bike and are very good quality handlebars. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a more upright and comfortable ride.

All components slid back on with no issue, but I would recommend you slide everything on prior to tightening the neck down so you can slide the bars back and forth for each side. Well worth the swap.
